tasks.task: Construct a low-cost rope pump for accessing clean water.
subtasks: Gather necessary tools (hand saw, hand drill, knife, wrenches).
Acquire local materials (wood, used car tire, rope, PVC pipe, glass bottles, wire, wax, nails, bolts).
Drill holes in wood for bearings.
Create glass bottles as friction reducers.
Make double piston arrangement using tire sidewall.
Assemble the pump using wood bearings and pistons.
Lower the rope with piston down the 20-foot well.
Attach the rope pump to a three-row water distribution system made from wood and painted fabric.
Connect the drip irrigation system using Visqueen material.
Operate the leg-driven pump for agricultural needs.

tasks.task: Distribute water using a locally produced drip irrigation system.
subtasks: Install the Visqueen drip irrigation system.
Ensure proper attachment to the water distribution system.
Maintain water pressure and flow for efficient irrigation.
